Pre-Game Insights: South Africa have struggled with chasing targets in ODIs this year, with most of their successful batting performances coming when batting first.
South Africa's last successful chase was against Netherlands in March 2023, with a modest target of 190.
South Africa lost their last ODI series against Bangladesh 2-1 at home in March 2022.
South Africa's two losses to Bangladesh in World Cups (2007 and 2019) came while batting second.
Aiden Markram mentioned that South Africa will try to approach chases as if they are setting a target, focusing on intensity and standards.
